 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מאֹזַנְיָא‎</span> ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] [[BDB#Str|Str]]) **noun masculine emphatic** ==scale, balance== (compare also Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מוזאניא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 148, Egyptian</sup> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מוזנא‎</span> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>G 24, Christian-Palestinian</sup> Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 5</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>BSW 56</sup> [[BDB#Jacob|Jacob]]<sup>ZAW xxil (1902), 90</sup>); — [[Dan.5.27|Dan 5:27]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] dual emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מאֹזְנַיָּא‎</span>, see [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 51, 1, Anm.</sup> [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>33</sup>\*).
